title: Chicken Alfredo
steps: Season and cook chicken in oil until golden, 6-7 minutes per side. Rest, then slice.
Cook pasta until al dente. Reserve 1 cup pasta water.
Melt butter, add garlic, cook 30 seconds. Add cream, simmer 2-3 minutes.
Off heat, gradually stir in Parmesan until melted.
Add pasta, toss. Add pasta water for silky consistency.
Season with nutmeg, salt, pepper. Top with chicken and parsley.
notes: Real Alfredo is just butter, Parmesan, pasta water - cream is American addition.
Take pot off heat before adding cheese to prevent clumping.
